seasonal_mismatch.explanation: Off-season items can be purchased cheap and sold during peak season

new_product_launch.explanation: New products may have pricing inconsistencies across platforms initially

bundle_breakup.explanation: Buying bundles and selling individual items can yield higher total revenue

risk_indicators.high_return_rate: Products with >20% return rate reduce net profit significantly
risk_indicators.patent_restrictions: Check for patent or trademark restrictions before sourcing
risk_indicators.seasonal_dependency: High seasonal variance increases inventory risk
risk_indicators.competition_surge: Popular items may see rapid competition increase
risk_indicators.platform_policy: Amazon/eBay policy changes can affect category profitability

success_factors.demand_validation: Products with consistent sales rank indicate stable demand
success_factors.price_stability: Items with stable pricing history are lower risk
success_factors.supplier_reliability: Consistent supplier availability reduces sourcing risk
success_factors.market_size: Larger markets provide more selling opportunities
success_factors.differentiation: Unique value propositions reduce price competition
